channel.title: New Server and Compile Error
channel.description: Hi there. This is my first post in here so i'll start off by introducing myself. My name is josh aka flipzro and I i live in san diego. I recently started getting back into runescape and decided to mess around with the private servers i'd been hearing about. I sucessfully downloaded a source, up-to-date jre and jdk, moparscape client 3.2 w/ aryan, and no-ip duc. My server is all set up except for one thing. My compuler seems to be working perfectly fine, but when I edit my character to have server owner right of 3, it does not work. Though i saved and complied before logging in, my character file seems to revert back to the way it was before I edited to have 3. The solution is probably simple to those of you who are adept to java coding and server development, but it's left me dumbfounded. Help would be much appreciated. Thanks

item.title: New Server and Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @flipzro flipzro
item.description:
@flipzro wrote:

so how will i be able to fix that?

Read full topic

item.title: New Server and Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

An Output Stream is An object that’s capable of sending data from a Java program to a source such as a text file or Internet server.

If it’s unable to open the Output Stream it will not be able to write any data.

Read full topic

item.title: New Server and Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @flipzro flipzro
item.description:
@flipzro wrote:

still not workin… does it mean anything that everytime i log-in, it says in the moparscape client console that it isnt able to open the output-stream of the log file for any character i log into the server with?

Read full topic

item.title: New Server and Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

Listen, you login with 0 rights, logout, change the rights to 3, save the txt file, don’t restart server or compile, and log back in.

Read full topic

item.title: New Server and Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @flipzro flipzro
item.description:
@flipzro wrote:

yeh ive read through enough of the posts that mention compile errors to know that. whenever and edit and compile, i make sure im logged out. but for some reason upon log in the character file remains the same, without the desired changes reflected in-game. then when i log out again the character file changes back… iuno whats goin on lol

Read full topic

item.title: New Server and Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

You must logout to edit your account.

Read full topic
